metadata.dc:author: Balaguera, J
Perea-Sasiain, J
metadata.dc:description: 18 out of 19 female mice treated orally with different levels of mimosine in the drinking water were fertile. Subcutaneous injection of mimosine (400 mg/kg) to 23 pregnant mice, in a single dose on days 5, 10, 15 or 17, resulted in death and resorption or expulsion of dead embryos, except in one, early inoculated. L-Phenylalanine (600 mg/kg) injected subcutaneously on day 17 prevented abortion in 4 out of 5 mice subsequently injected with mimosine.
metadata.dc:title: Acción abortiva de la mimosina y su prevención.
[Abortive activity of mimosine and its prevention (author's transl)].
